name: Castle of Chaos
description:
Welcome to the Castle of Chaos! Do you think you can plunder the castle's riches? I dare say you are mistaken, as the Arch Lorde of Darkiness will throw everything at his disposal to destroy you!

For Ludum Dare 49. Made in 2 days at an exhausting pace. I need a nap.

Controls

----

Left/Right - Move

Z -Jump

X - Swing your sword
